description.value: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Humanoid Form] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mirror Image] as 2nd-level arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
